QuestionStem: Explore the image to find out how DNA is organized in a cell.

content.imageAlt: Click on the illustration to learn about the relationship between the cell, chromosomes, and DNA.

panels.title: Cell
panels.description: The DNA of most eukaryotic cells is found inside the nucleus.

panels.title: Chromosome
panels.description: During an early stage of cell division, DNA is organized into structures called chromosomes.

panels.title: DNA
panels.description: The DNA molecule contains genetic information.
